thread.section_title: North Carolina High School Sports Headlines
thread.title: Top Five In Soccer

title: Top Five In Soccer
text: Chap Carter & Mike Williams NCPrivateSchoolSports.com Wesleyan Christian Academy retains both the top spot in the 3A as well as their undefeated season. The Men of Troy downed arch rival Greensboro Day, 1-0, to win the PACIS title and a possible top four seed in the soccer playoffs. Christ School jumps to #2 in the rankings, the highest the Greenies have ever been in their soccer history. Christ School, under the guidance of former of head coach Guy Campbell, a former Greenies soccer player himself, had a huge win over Asheville Christian, 3-0. They face the ACA Lions tomorrow at Asheville Christian. ... More ... To continue reading this article you must be a member. Sign Up Now!
